mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Château de Versailles (Versailles, France)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les dames de la halle partant pour aller chercher le roi à Versailles
Women of the market leave to go look for the King at Versailles
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A large, elaborate carriage is surrounded by several women outside of a gated wall which encloses a forest and buildings. There appears to be a large presence of soldiers in formation as well
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
